[03] 50^b^.^eb^ (ka) ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlāti? tīṇeva kusalamūlāni. avasesā kusalā dhammā na kusalamūlā.
[03] (kha) ye vā pana kusalamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalāti? āmantā.
[03] 51^b^.^eb^ (ka) ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlena ekamūlāti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) ye vā pana kusalamūlena ekamūlā, sabbe te dhammā kusalāti ^a^M1.0007^ea^?
[03] kusalasamuṭṭhānaṃ ^a^V1.0010^ea^ rūpaṃ kusalamūlena ekamūlaṃ, na kusalaṃ. kusalaṃ kusalamūlena ekamūlañceva kusalañca.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ (ka) cakkhu ^a^V1.0116^ea^ cakkhāyatananti?
[03] dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhāyatanaṃ. cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhu ceva cakkhāyatanañca.
[03] (kha) cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhūti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) sotaṃ sotāyatananti?
[03] dibbasotaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ sotaṃ, na sotāyatanaṃ. sotāyatanaṃ sotañceva sotāyatanañca.
[03] (kha) sotāyatanaṃ sotanti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) ghānaṃ ghānāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) ghānāyatanaṃ ghānanti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) jivhā jivhāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) jivhāyatanaṃ jivhāti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) kāyo ^a^M1.0076^ea^ kāyāyatananti?
[03] kāyāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo, na kāyāyatanaṃ. kāyāyatanaṃ kāyo ceva kāyāyatanañca.
[03] (kha) kāyāyatanaṃ kāyoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) rūpaṃ rūpāyatananti?
[03] rūpāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ rūpaṃ, na rūpāyatanaṃ. rūpāyatanaṃ rūpañceva ^a^T1.0092^ea^ rūpāyatanañca.
[03] (kha) rūpāyatanaṃ rūpanti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) saddo ^a^V1.0117^ea^ saddāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) saddāyatanaṃ saddoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) gandho gandhāyatananti?
[03] sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho gandho, na gandhāyatanaṃ. gandhāyatanaṃ gandho ceva gandhāyatanañca.
[03] (kha) gandhāyatanaṃ gandhoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) raso rasāyatananti?
[03] attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso raso, na rasāyatanaṃ. rasāyatanaṃ raso ceva rasāyatanañca.
[03] (kha) rasāyatanaṃ rasoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) phoṭṭhabbo phoṭṭhabbāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabboti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) mano manāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) manāyatanaṃ manoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) dhammo dhammāyatananti?
[03] dhammāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammāyatanaṃ. dhammāyatanaṃ dhammo ceva dhammāyatanañca.
[03] (kha) dhammāyatanaṃ dhammoti? āmantā.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ (ka) na cakkhu na cakkhāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na cakkhāyatanaṃ na cakkhūti?
[03] dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu na cakkhāyatanaṃ, cakkhu. cakkhuñca cakkhāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ {avasesā (syā0 pī0)} na ceva cakkhu na ca cakkhāyatanaṃ.
[03] (ka) na sotaṃ na sotāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na sotāyatanaṃ na sotanti?
[03] dibbasotaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ na sotāyatanaṃ, sotaṃ. sotañca sotāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva sotaṃ na ca sotāyatanaṃ.
[03] (ka) na ^a^V1.0118^ea^ ^a^M1.0077^ea^ ghānaṃ na ghānāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na ghānāyatanaṃ na ghānanti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) na jivhā na jivhāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na jivhāyatanaṃ na jivhāti? āmantā ^a^T1.0093^ea^.
[03] (ka) na kāyo na kāyāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na kāyāyatanaṃ na kāyoti?
[03] kāyāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso na kāyāyatanaṃ, kāyo. kāyañca kāyāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ {avaseso (syā0)} na ceva kāyo na ca kāyāyatanaṃ.
[03] (ka) na rūpaṃ na rūpāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na rūpāyatanaṃ na rūpanti?
[03] rūpāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na rūpāyatanaṃ, rūpaṃ. rūpañca rūpāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva rūpaṃ na ca rūpāyatanaṃ.
[03] (ka) na saddo na saddāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na saddāyatanaṃ na saddoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) na gandho na gandhāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na gandhāyatanaṃ na gandhoti?
[03] sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho na gandhāyatanaṃ, gandho. gandhañca gandhāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ {avasesā (syā0)} na ceva gandho na ca gandhāyatanaṃ.
[03] (ka) na raso na rasāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na rasāyatanaṃ na rasoti?
[03] attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso na rasāyatanaṃ, raso. rasañca rasāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva raso na ca rasāyatanaṃ.
[03] (ka) na phoṭṭhabbo na phoṭṭhabbāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ na phoṭṭhabboti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) na ^a^V1.0119^ea^ mano na manāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na manāyatanaṃ na manoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) na dhammo na dhammāyatananti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) na dhammāyatanaṃ na dhammoti?
[03] dhammāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso na dhammāyatanaṃ, dhammo. dhammañca dhammāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva dhammo na ca dhammāyatanaṃ.

[03] rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā...pe0... saddaṃ ṭhapetvā...pe0... gandhaṃ ṭhapetvā...pe0... rasaṃ ṭhapetvā...pe0... phoṭṭhabbaṃ ṭhapetvā...pe0... na ca āyatanā. nāyatanā na phoṭṭhabbāyatananti? āmantā.

[03] pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati rūpāyatanañca na ^a^T1.0258^ea^ nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0276^ea^ yattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ ^a^M1.0190^ea^ tasaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? āmantā. (cakkhāyatanamūlakaṃ)
[03] 245^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhissati ^a^T1.0259^ea^.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] kāmāvacarā cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ rūpāvacarānaṃ ^a^V1.0277^ea^ arūpāvacarānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? āmantā. (ghānāyatanamūlakaṃ)
[03] 246^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0191^ea^ yattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha manāyatanaṃ ^a^T1.0260^ea^ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati. parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanañca na nirujjhissati rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0278^ea^ yattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? āmantā.
[03] 247^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha manāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acittakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? āmantā.
[03] 248^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjittha tassa sotāyatanaṃ nirujjhissatīti?

[03] pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca ^a^T1.0261^ea^ arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ sotāyatanaṃ nirujjhissati. itaresaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanañca uppajjittha sotāyatanañca nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0279^ea^ vā pana sotāyatanaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjitthāti? āmantā.

[03] (yathā ^a^M1.0192^ea^ nirodhavāre atītānāgatā {atītenānāgatā (syā0)} pucchā yassakampi yatthakampi yassayatthakampi anulomampi paccanīkampi vibhattaṃ, evaṃ uppādanirodhepi atītānāgatā pucchā vibhajitabbā.)
[06] uppādanirodhavāro.
[06] pavattivāro niṭṭhito.
[03] 249^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānāti so sotāyatanaṃ parijānātīti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ parijānāti so cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānātīti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) yo cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānāti so sotāyatanaṃ na parijānātīti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ na parijānāti so cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānātīti? āmantā.
[03] 250^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānittha so sotāyatanaṃ parijānitthāti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) yo ^a^V1.0280^ea^ vā pana sotāyatanaṃ parijānittha so cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānitthāti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) yo cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānittha so sotāyatanaṃ na parijānitthāti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ na ^a^T1.0262^ea^ parijānittha so cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānitthāti? āmantā.
[03] 251^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānissati so sotāyatanaṃ parijānissatīti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānissatīti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) yo ^a^M1.0193^ea^ cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānissati so sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissatīti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānissatīti? āmantā.
[03] 252^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānāti so sotāyatanaṃ parijānitthāti? no.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ parijānittha so cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānātīti? no.
[03] (ka) yo cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānāti so sotāyatanaṃ na parijānitthāti?
[03] arahā cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānāti, no ca sotāyatanaṃ na parijānittha. aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā cakkhāyatanañca na parijānanti sotāyatanañca na parijānittha.
[03] (kha) yo ^a^V1.0281^ea^ vā pana sotāyatanaṃ na parijānittha so cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānātīti?

[03] aggamaggasamaṅgī sotāyatanaṃ na parijānittha, no ca cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānāti. aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā sotāyatanañca na parijānittha cakkhāyatanañca na parijānanti.
[03] 253^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānāti so sotāyatanaṃ parijānissatīti? no.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānātīti? no.
[03] (ka) yo cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānāti so sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissatīti?

[03] ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānanti ^a^T1.0263^ea^, no ca sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissanti. arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanañca na parijānanti sotāyatanañca na parijānissanti.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānātīti?

[03] aggamaggasamaṅgī sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissati, no ca cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānāti. arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te sotāyatanañca na parijānissanti cakkhāyatanañca na parijānanti.
[03] 254^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^M1.0194^ea^ cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānittha so sotāyatanaṃ parijānissatīti? no.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṃ parijānitthāti? no.
[03] (ka) yo ^a^V1.0282^ea^ cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānittha so sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissatīti?

[03] ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānittha, no ca sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissanti. aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanañca na parijānittha sotāyatanañca na parijānissanti.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānitthāti?

[03] arahā sotāyatanaṃ na parijānissati, no ca cakkhāyatanaṃ na parijānittha. aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te sotāyatanañca na parijānissanti cakkhāyatanañca na parijānittha.
[06] pariññāvāro.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ (ka) cakkhu ^a^V1.0289^ea^ cakkhudhātūti?
[03] dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhudhātu. cakkhudhātu cakkhu ceva cakkhudhātu ca.
[03] (kha) cakkhudhātu cakkhūti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) sotaṃ sotadhātūti?
[03] dibbasotaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ sotaṃ, na sotadhātu. sotadhātu sotañceva sotadhātu ca.
[03] (kha) sotadhātu sotanti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) ghānaṃ ghānadhātūti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) ghānadhātu ghānanti? āmantā. (jivhāpi ghānadhātusadisā).
[03] (ka) kāyo kāyadhātūti?
[03] kāyadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo {avaseso kāyo kāyo (syā0)}, na kāyadhātu. kāyadhātu kāyo ^a^T1.0267^ea^ ceva kāyadhātu ca.
[03] (kha) kāyadhātu kāyoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) rūpaṃ rūpadhātūti?
[03] rūpadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ rūpaṃ, na rūpadhātu. rūpadhātu rūpañceva rūpadhātu ca.
[03] (kha) rūpadhātu rūpanti? āmantā. (saddo ghānasadiso).
[03] (ka) gandho ^a^V1.0290^ea^ ^a^M1.0199^ea^ gandhadhātūti?
[03] sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho gandho, na gandhadhātu. gandhadhātu gandho ceva gandhadhātu ca.
[03] (kha) gandhadhātu gandhoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) raso rasadhātūti?
[03] attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso raso, na rasadhātu. rasadhātu raso ceva rasadhātu ca.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^T1.0272^ea^ cakkhudhātu uppajjati tassa sotadhātu uppajjatīti?

[03] sacakkhukānaṃ asotakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ sotadhātu uppajjati. sacakkhukānaṃ sasotakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati sotadhātu ca uppajjati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana sotadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?

[03] sasotakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotadhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati. sasotakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ sotadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0297^ea^ cakkhudhātu uppajjati tassa ghānadhātu uppajjatīti?

[03] sacakkhukānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ ghānadhātu ^a^M1.0204^ea^ uppajjati. sacakkhukānaṃ saghānakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati ghānadhātu ca uppajjati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana ghānadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?

[03] saghānakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānadhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati. saghānakānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa cakkhudhātu uppajjati tassa rūpadhātu uppajjatīti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana rūpadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?

[03] sarūpakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpadhātu uppajjati ^a^T1.0273^ea^, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati. sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.

[03] (kha) yassa vā pana manoviññāṇadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?

[03] sacittakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhudhātu uppajjati. sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.

[03] (kha) yassa vā pana dhammadhātu uppajjati tassa cakkhudhātu uppajjatīti?
[03] acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammadhātu uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ ^a^V1.0298^ea^ cakkhudhātu uppajjati. sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammadhātu ca uppajjati cakkhudhātu ca uppajjati.

[03] kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ {avasesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ (syā0) evamuparipi}, na dukkhaṃ. kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhañceva dukkhasaccañca.
[03] (ka) samudayo samudayasaccanti?
[03] samudayasaccaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso samudayo, na samudayasaccaṃ. samudayasaccaṃ samudayo ceva samudayasaccañca.
[03] (kha) samudayasaccaṃ samudayoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) nirodho nirodhasaccanti?
[03] nirodhasaccaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso nirodho, na nirodhasaccaṃ. nirodhasaccaṃ ^a^T1.0277^ea^ nirodho ceva nirodhasaccañca.
[03] (kha) nirodhasaccaṃ nirodhoti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) maggo maggasaccanti?
[03] maggasaccaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso maggo, na maggasaccaṃ. maggasaccaṃ maggo ceva maggasaccañca.
[03] (kha) maggasaccaṃ maggoti? āmantā.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ (ka) na dukkhaṃ na dukkhasaccanti?

[03] abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ nuppajjittha. anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ samudayasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca nuppajjittha.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana maggasaccaṃ nuppajjittha tassa samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati. anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ maggasaccañca nuppajjittha samudayasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ yattha ^a^V1.0329^ea^ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati...pe0....
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjitthāti?

[03] catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjittha. suddhāvāsānaṃ ^a^T1.0299^ea^ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati samudayasaccañca nuppajjittha.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjittha tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccañca nuppajjittha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0225^ea^ yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjitthāti?

[03] abhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjittha. suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe anabhisametāvīnaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca nuppajjittha.
[03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0330^ea^ vā pana yattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjittha tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe anabhisametāvīnaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe anabhisametāvīnaṃ ^a^T1.0300^ea^ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggasaccañca nuppajjittha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] 67^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjitthāti?

[03] abhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjittha. suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca nuppajjittha.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjittha tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati. suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne anabhisametāvīnaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggasaccañca nuppajjittha samudayasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ ^a^T1.0301^ea^ uppajjissati ^a^V1.0331^ea^. itaresaṃ upapajjantānaṃ ^a^M1.0226^ea^ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccañca uppajjati samudayasaccañca uppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissati tassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti?

[03] sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati. sabbesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccañca uppajjissati dukkhasaccañca uppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati. yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccañca uppajjati maggasaccañca uppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati tassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti?

[03] yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ ^a^T1.0302^ea^ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati. yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccañca uppajjissati dukkhasaccañca uppajjati.
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0332^ea^ samudayasaccaṃ uppajjati tassa maggasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti?

[03] ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati. ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccañca uppajjati maggasaccañca uppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati tassa samudayasaccaṃ uppajjatīti?

[03] yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti ye {paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye (sī0 syā0) puggalokāsavārepi} caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ uppajjati. ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya ^a^M1.0227^ea^ uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccañca uppajjissati samudayasaccañca uppajjati.
[03] 70^b^.^eb^ yattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati...pe0... (yatthakampi yassayatthakasadisaṃ kātabbaṃ).
[03] 71^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti ^a^T1.0303^ea^?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissati. itaresaṃ catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca uppajjati samudayasaccañca uppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0333^ea^ vā pana yattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti?

[03] catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati. catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccañca uppajjissati dukkhasaccañca uppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati. yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti ^a^T1.0304^ea^ tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca uppajjati maggasaccañca uppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatīti?

[03] yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ^a^M1.0228^ea^ ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati. yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggasaccañca uppajjissati dukkhasaccañca uppajjati.
[03] 72^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V1.0334^ea^ yattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti?

[03] āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati. ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccañca uppajjati maggasaccañca uppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjatīti?

[03] yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe ^a^T1.0305^ea^ taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjati. ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggasaccañca uppajjissati samudayasaccañca uppajjati.
[03] 73^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjissatīti?

[03] sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati samudayasaccañca nuppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjissati tassa dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ^a^V1.0335^ea^ arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccañca nuppajjissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0229^ea^ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissatīti?

[03] yassa ^a^T1.0306^ea^ cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca nuppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissati tassa dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccañca nuppajjissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] 74^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissatīti?

[03] yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissānti ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ ^a^T1.0307^ea^ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissati. aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte ^a^V1.0336^ea^ vattamāne tesaṃ samudayasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca nuppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissati tassa samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṃ maggasaccañca nuppajjissati samudayasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati...pe0....
[03] 76^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0230^ea^ yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjissatīti?

[03] catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ ^a^T1.0308^ea^ tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati samudayasaccañca nuppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa ^a^V1.0337^ea^ cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccañca nuppajjissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissatīti?

[03] yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññattā cavantānaṃ arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca nuppajjissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissati ^a^T1.0309^ea^ tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa ^a^M1.0231^ea^ bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggasaccañca nuppajjissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.

[03] catuvokāraṃ pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nirujjhati. catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccañca nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nirujjhati.
[03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nirujjhati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ nirujjhissatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nirujjhissati. yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti ^a^M1.0246^ea^ tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca nirujjhati maggasaccañca nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa ^a^V1.0359^ea^ vā pana yattha maggasaccaṃ nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nirujjhatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nirujjhissati ^a^T1.0331^ea^, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nirujjhati. yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggasaccañca nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nirujjhati.
[03] 120^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ nirujjhissatīti?

[03] āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nirujjhissati. ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccañca nirujjhati maggasaccañca nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṃ nirujjhissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati. ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggasaccañca nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca nirujjhati.
[03] 121^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhati tassa samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] sabbesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe ^a^T1.0332^ea^ maggassa ^a^V1.0360^ea^ ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccañca ^a^M1.0247^ea^ na nirujjhati samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhati. aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca na nirujjhati.
[03] (ka) yassa dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhati tassa maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ ^a^T1.0333^ea^ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccañca na nirujjhati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā ^a^V1.0361^ea^ maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ na nirujjhati. arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca na nirujjhati.
[03] 122^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhati tassa maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya ^a^M1.0248^ea^ uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṃ samudayasaccañca na nirujjhati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.

[03] sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca ^a^T1.0352^ea^ nuppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa ^a^V1.0380^ea^ bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ ^a^M1.0261^ea^ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] 160^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ ^a^T1.0353^ea^ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṃ samudayasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ ^a^V1.0381^ea^ maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne tesaṃ maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] 161^b^.^eb^ yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati...pe0....
[03] 162^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa ^a^M1.0262^ea^ bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa ^a^T1.0354^ea^ anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggamaggassa ^a^V1.0382^ea^ ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] (ka) yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa ^a^T1.0355^ea^ uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā {apāyā asaññasattā (syā0)} cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ {apāyaṃ asaññasattaṃ (syā0)} upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] 163^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M1.0263^ea^ yattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

[03] aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte ^a^V1.0383^ea^ vattamāne tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.
[03] (kha) yassa vā pana yattha maggasaccaṃ ^a^T1.0356^ea^ na nirujjhissati tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatīti?

[03] āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjati. aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ taṇhāya bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati samudayasaccañca nuppajjati.
[03] 164^b^.^eb^ yassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjittha tassa samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
[03] (yathā nirodhavāre atītānāgatā {atītenānāgatā (syā0)} pucchā anulomampi paccanīkampi vibhattā evaṃ uppādanirodhavārepi asammohantena vibhajitabbaṃ).
[06] uppādanirodhavāro.
[06] pavattivāro niṭṭhito.
[03] 165^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^V1.0384^ea^ dukkhasaccaṃ parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ pajahatīti? āmantā.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ pajahati so dukkhasaccaṃ parijānātīti? āmantā.
[03] (ka) yo ^a^M1.0264^ea^ dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ nappajahatīti? āmantā.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo dukkhasaccaṃ parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ pajahitthāti? no.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ pajahittha so dukkhasaccaṃ parijānātīti? no.
[03] (ka) yo dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ nappajahitthāti?
[03] arahā dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti, no ca samudayasaccaṃ nappajahittha. aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti samudayasaccañca nappajahittha.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nappajahittha so dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānātīti?

[03] aggamaggasamaṅgī samudayasaccaṃ nappajahittha, no ca dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti. aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā samudayasaccañca nappajahittha dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti.
[03] 169^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^T1.0358^ea^ dukkhasaccaṃ parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ pajahissatīti? no.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ pajahissati so dukkhasaccaṃ parijānātīti? no.
[03] (ka) yo ^a^M1.0265^ea^ dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissatīti?

[03] ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānanti, no ca samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissanti. arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti ^a^V1.0386^ea^ te dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissati so dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānātīti?

[03] aggamaggasamaṅgī samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissati, no ca dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti. arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti.
[03] 170^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo dukkhasaccaṃ parijānittha so samudayasaccaṃ pajahissatīti? no.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ pajahissati so dukkhasaccaṃ parijānitthāti? no.
[03] (ka) yo dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānittha so samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissatīti?

[03] ye maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānittha, no ca te samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissanti. aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccañca na parijānittha samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti.
[03] (kha) yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissati so dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānitthāti?

[03] arahā samudayasaccaṃ nappajahissati, no ca dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānittha. aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te ^a^T1.0359^ea^ samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti dukkhasaccañca na parijānittha.
[06] pariññāvāro.
